description: Morecambe secure back-to-back victories for the first time this season as a 2-0 win against Cheltenham keeps alive their hopes of staying in the Football League.
title: Morecambe 2-0 Cheltenham Town
maintext:
Morecambe have lost four of their last five Football League games against Cheltenham Town (W1), with three of those defeats coming via two goal margins.
Cheltenham Town have won just one of their last six away Football League games against Morecambe (D1 L4), a 3-1 victory in March 2022.
Morecambe are winless in their last five league games played in April, losing four of them (D1).
